name: pg-test-util
description: Helper methods for PostgreSQL to use in tests.

scripts.doc: rm -R doc; jsdoc -c jsdoc-conf.json README-JSDOC.md;    rm -f README.md;    jsdoc2md --src "lib/**/*" >JSDOC.md;    cat README-JSDOC.md JSDOC.md History.md LICENSE > README.md;    rm -r -f JSDOC.md;

author: Özüm Eldoğan
